title: Emotional support is key for stroke patients, research suggests

title_detail.value: Emotional support is key for stroke patients, research suggests

summary: Doctors caring for severe stroke patients need to take account of their psychological needs and help prepare families for the possibility that they may not recover, a study suggests.

summary_detail.value: Doctors caring for severe stroke patients need to take account of their psychological needs and help prepare families for the possibility that they may not recover, a study suggests.
